features.title: Where all your emotions become a masterpiece
features.subtitle: LikeButter's AI fairy 'Butter' will guide you to melt your fandom into diverse content.

butterTalks.title: ButterTalks
butterTalks.desc: Share the stories you want to share with your favorite artist with our AI. It all starts with pouring out your feelings.

butterCover.title: ButterCover
butterCover.desc: Create a one-of-a-kind fan song with your emotions, or create a cover song with your favorite artist's voice.

butterBrush.title: ButterBrush
butterBrush.desc: Complete your AI fan art by entering the image that comes to your mind as text or by uploading a picture.

butterCuts.title: ButterCuts
butterCuts.desc: Easily edit a sensational fan-made video by combining generated images, music, and your own videos.

demo.title: How it Works
demo.subtitle: See how your ideas come to life in just a few clicks.

pricing.sectionSubtitle: Start for free, and upgrade to the Pro plan when you need more professional creative activities.
pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for you. Cancel anytime.
